name: The Chamber (Valettus)
description:
A unique puzzle game where the rules change with every level! Use ingenuity, memory, and skill to discover the solutions.

Once you finish try again and see how fast you can get through them all!

This game was created in 2 weeks as part of a project to experiment with different ideas.

Honest feedback is appreciated, like it or not!

Thanks for checking out my game.

Music public domain from FreePD.com
